verbose_text: Protective effects of PEEP seem to be procedure specific, as one study found that PEEP of at least 5 cmH 2 O in major abdominal surgery lowers odds of PRCs, while the same PEEP was not associated with significant effects on PRCs in craniotomy patients [XREF_BIBR * *].
evidence: PEEP of at least 5 cmH 2 O in major abdominal surgery lowers odds of PRCs
